DVSBadArgumentsException Class Reference

A method was called with inappropriate arguments for the current configuration of the DVS board For example, specifying buffers for fields for video output, when the DVS board is configured for frames. More...

#include <DVSClasses.h>

Inheritance diagram for DVSBadArgumentsException::


Public Methods

 DVSBadArgumentsException (const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
 DVSBadArgumentsException (const DVSBadArgumentsException &e) throw ()

Detailed Description

A method was called with inappropriate arguments for the current configuration of the DVS board For example, specifying buffers for fields for video output, when the DVS board is configured for frames.

Parameters:
context   Information on the context in which this exception is occurring - eg. the function call that caused it. NULL if no context string is required
e   The causal parent exception of this one being instantiated. See DVSException::DVSException()
